sentences.en: an agreement to secure the future of the rainforest
sentences.cn: 一份保护热带雨林未来的协议

sentences.en: At last they were able to feel secure about the future.
sentences.cn: 他们终于觉得不必为将来而担忧了。

sentences.en: Boyd’s goal secured his team’s place in the Cup Final.
sentences.cn: 博伊德的进球确保了球队进入足总杯决赛。

sentences.en: Britain is intensifying its efforts to secure the release of the hostages.
sentences.cn: 英国正加紧努力确保人质的获释。

sentences.en: Check joints are secure and the wood is sound.
sentences.cn: 检查一下连接处是否稳固及木料是否结实。

sentences.en: Companies can offer secure credit card transactions over the Internet.
sentences.cn: 公司可以提供安全的网上信用卡交易。

sentences.en: Federal leaders continued their efforts to secure a ceasefire.
sentences.cn: 联邦领导人继续争取促成停火协议。

sentences.en: He was indefatigable in his efforts to secure funding for new projects.
sentences.cn: 他不知疲倦地努力为新项目寻求资金。

sentences.en: I couldn't remember ever having felt so safe and secure.
sentences.cn: 我从未有过如此安全的感觉。

sentences.en: Keep your passport in a secure place .
sentences.cn: 把你的护照放在安全的地方。

sentences.en: Negotiators are still working to secure the hostages’ release.
sentences.cn: 谈判人员仍在努力争取人质获释。

sentences.en: Over a tenth of the population have secure, undemanding jobs.
sentences.cn: 超过1/10的人口拥有稳定且相对轻松的工作。

sentences.en: Redgrave won his third Olympic gold medal, and secured his place in history .
sentences.cn: 雷德格雷夫赢得了个人第三枚奥运会金牌，使自己的名字载入了史册。

sentences.en: Secure the anchor by lashing it to the rail.
sentences.cn: 把锚系到栏杆上拴牢。

sentences.en: Secure with a few spots of glue.
sentences.cn: 用几滴胶水粘住。

sentences.en: She arrived early to secure a place at the front.
sentences.cn: 为了能占个靠前的位置，她提早到了。

sentences.en: Shelves are only as secure as their fixings.
sentences.cn: 架子的牢固程度取决于固件。

sentences.en: Supporters say open source software is more secure.
sentences.cn: 拥护者认为开放源代码软件安全性更高。

sentences.en: Swaddle your newborn baby so that she feels secure.
sentences.cn: 把你刚出生的孩子用襁褓包裹住，这样她会有安全感。

sentences.en: The dug-outs were secure from everything but a direct hit.
sentences.cn: 除非是直接被击中，否则这个地下掩体是非常安全的。

sentences.en: The house isn’t very secure – we need some new locks.
sentences.cn: 这房子不是很安全——我们需要加几把新锁。

sentences.en: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.cn: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.en: They secure their degrees by slogging through an intensive 11-month course.
sentences.cn: 他们苦学了11个月的强化课程，拿到了学位。

sentences.en: They want secure, waged employment.
sentences.cn: 他们想要稳定的、有工资的工作。

sentences.en: Troops were sent to secure the border.
sentences.cn: 军队被派去保卫边境。

sentences.en: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.cn: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

sentences.en: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.cn: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

words.tran_cn: 安全的；可靠的（secure的比较级形式）
安全地；牢固地；安心地；有把握地
获得安全；船抛锚；停止工作

trans.tran_cn: 安心的，稳定的，安全的，坚固的，锁牢的
trans.tran_en: safe from and protected against damage or attack

trans.tran_cn: 争取到，实现，使固定，拴牢，保卫，抵押
trans.tran_en: to make something safe from being attacked, harmed, or lost

trans.tran_cn: 得到， 获得； 使安全， 保卫； 缚牢
trans.tran_en: to get or achieve something that will be permanent, especially after a lot of effort
